snippet: A United Nations peacekeeper was killed on Friday in Sudan’s main oil region when shells struck a logistics base, a United Nations spokesman said.
abstract: United Nations peacekeeper is killed in shelling of Sudanese logistics base.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations peacekeeper was killed on Friday in Sudan’s main oil region when shells struck a logistics base, a United Nations spokesman said.

headline.main: United Nations Soldier in Sudan Is Slain
headline.print_headline: Sudan: United Nations Soldier Is Slain
